question: I am a Pyronite from the star Pyros. I can generate intense fire and fly using a flame board. Who am I?
I have no eyes, but my sense of smell and hearing are unmatched. I am a Vulpimancer. Who am I?
My body is made of organic crystal stronger than diamond. I can shoot shards and regenerate. Who am I?
I am the fastest alien in the classic Omnitrix, capable of running at 500 mph. Who am I?
I am small in size but have a massive intellect. I can fix any machine. Who am I?
I have four arms and incredible strength. I can create shockwaves by clapping my hands. Who am I?
I am a Piscciss Volann. I dominate underwater battles with my powerful jaws but need water to breathe. Who am I?
I am a Galvanic Mechamorph. I can merge with technology and upgrade it to a superior state. Who am I?
I can turn invisible, phase through walls, and reveal a scary true form from under my skin. Who am I?
I can curl into an indestructible ball and roll at high speeds to smash enemies. Who am I?
I can stretch my vine limbs, throw explosive seeds, and merge with plant life. Who am I?
I look like a werewolf and possess a powerful sonic howl. Who am I?
My body is made of bandages that I can control to trap enemies. I resemble a mummy. Who am I?
I generate electricity through the coils on my back and have electromagnetic strength. Who am I?
I can eat almost any matter or energy and spit it back out as an explosive blast. Who am I?
I can duplicate myself into many copies, but we all share the same pain. Who am I?
I have eyes all over my body that can shoot different types of energy beams. Who am I?
I am a To'kustar, born in cosmic storms. I am massive and can shoot cosmic rays. Who am I?
I look like a pufferfish and spit high-pressure conductive slime. Who am I?
I am a tiny living battery that can travel through electrical currents and duplicate when energized. Who am I?
I can freeze enemies solid with my ice breath. I helped Ben 10,000 freeze Vilgax. Who am I?
I am a Chronian with time manipulation powers, appearing in Race Against Time. Who am I?
